clousures.description: Lanes reduced on the northbound 241 Toll Road between the 261 Toll Road interchange and the Windy Ridge Toll Point from 2 a.m. to 5 a.m. for sign work. No delays are anticipated.
The northbound 133 Toll Road connector to the southbound 241 Toll Road will be fully closed from midnight to 5 a.m. for guardrail work.
clousures.detour: Take the Irvine Boulevard off-ramp, turn right, turn left on Ridge Valley, turn right on Portola Parkway and continue driving to reach the southbound 133 on-ramp.

clousures.description: The southbound 133 connector to the southbound 73 Toll Road will be fully closed from midnight to 5 a.m. for miscellaneous work.
clousures.detour: Continue driving south on 133, which turns into Laguna Canyon Road. Turn left on El Toro Road, continue north on El Toro Road and turn right to take the southbound 73 on-ramp.
